abstract: Sales at Verizon missed the mark of analysts’ expectations as layoffs and other cost-cutting took a toll on the telephone and Internet business.
snippet: Sales at Verizon missed the mark of analysts’ expectations as layoffs and other cost-cutting took a toll on the telephone and Internet business.
lead_paragraph: Verizon, the telecommunications company, reported fourth-quarter sales on Tuesday that fell short of Wall Street projections as layoffs and other cost-cutting took a toll on the telephone and Internet business.

headline.main: Gain in Sales at Verizon Falls Short of Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Gain in Sales At Verizon Falls Short Of Forecasts
